overview: At ‘Fisty’s Barber Shop,’ the customer service doesn’t stop at fades, buzz cuts, and close shaves: these kinky barbers go above and beyond to loosen up their customers! Tom Moore directs as straight-laced clients walk on the wild side with the expert guidance of their thick-wristed barbers. Barber Joey D starts Seamus O’Reilly off with a quick trim - of the fuzzy ginger fur on his ass! Seamus and his buddy Colin Bryant get the full treatment, working up to a climactic finish as they are simultaneously fisted by Joey’s beefy, muscular arms. Cody Winter gives his client Issac Lin a trim “down there,” and Issac’s stiffening cock makes it clear that he wants more. Issac opens up for Cody, taking both his fists deep and hard before they shoot hot, creamy loads. At Fisty’s Barber Shop, these master barber’s will leave your head high and tight and your hole low and loose!
title: Fisty's Barber Shop
